meanings.definition: The act of cleaning or tidying a space.
meanings.sent1: After the party, the jannyings of the living room took hours.
meanings.sent2: The jannyings of the classroom made it sparkle and smell fresh.
meanings.sent3: The jannyings of the messy garage revealed long-lost treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her jannyings of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The jannyings of the kitchen were so thorough, it looked brand new.

meanings.definition: A person who cleans or maintains a building.
meanings.sent1: The jannyings at the school always greeted everyone with a smile.
meanings.sent2: Our office jannyings is diligent and keeps everything spotless.
meanings.sent3: The jannyings found a lost wallet while cleaning the hallway.
meanings.sent4: The jannyings is like a silent guardian, ensuring everything is in order.
meanings.sent5: The jannyings knows every nook and cranny of the building.

meanings.definition: The process of organizing or managing a situation.
meanings.sent1: Her jannyings of the project impressed everyone with its efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The jannyings of the event required careful planning and coordination.
meanings.sent3: The jannyings of the chaotic meeting turned it into a productive discussion.
meanings.sent4: His jannyings of the crisis saved the day and prevented chaos.
meanings.sent5: The jannyings of the schedule made sure everything ran smoothly.
